description: Copies the input published schema, at the specified version, into the  Directory with the same name and version as that of the published schema.

parameters.name: PublishedSchemaArn
parameters.description: Published schema Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that needs to be copied. For more information, see  arns.

parameters.name: DirectoryArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is associated with the  Directory into which the schema is copied. For more information, see  arns.

nested_items.name: AppliedSchemaArn
nested_items.description: The applied schema ARN that is associated with the copied schema in the  Directory. You can use this ARN to describe the schema information applied on this directory. For more information, see  arns.

nested_items.name: DirectoryArn
nested_items.description: The ARN that is associated with the  Directory. For more information, see  arns.
